blogs.title: My first blog post
blogs.body:
Hello peeps and welcome to my blog!
As this is my first ever blog post, I will introduce myself and give a brief description of who I am.
blogs.author: Tony Mills

blogs.title: ReactJS Vs Vue.js
blogs.body:
In this blog post we will take a look at arguably the two most popular web development frameworks
React and Vue.js. This will be solely based on my opinions and some research I conducted over the past few weeks.
blogs.author: Terrence James
